Summary: Bright orb exploded, lite up entire sky
divs: Sighting DetailsThis report was taken over the phone by dispatch, witness left a message on Onebox Voicemail, left message, dispatch called back to take report. Steve Cox, Mufon Dispatch Date: 1-13-10 Location: Buckingham, PA Bucks County, Driving down Route 413 40 degrees 19'25.03 minutes N, 75 Degress 036'38.23 minutes W, Elevation 264 ft Witness states he was driving down Route 413 in Buckingham, he saw a bright star in the sky, slowly desending, lost it behind the tree line, right after that he saw a bright orb object falling from sky it disappeared then it exploaded lighting up the whole sky like lightning. Witness says it was Thursday morning at 1:30 pm, I am questioning weather it was Wed at 130 pm or Thursday Morning 1:30 am.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Buckingham
This sighting has never been favorited.
